00074 // Constants
00075 
00080 static const int CENSUS_FREQUENCY_10 = 4;
00081 
00086 static const int CENSUS_FREQUENCY_120 = CENSUS_FREQUENCY_10 * 12;
00087 
00091 static const int TAX_FREQUENCY = 48;

00097 /* comefrom: doEditWindow scoreDoer doMapInFront graphDoer doNilEvent */
00098 void Micropolis::simFrame()
00099 {
00100 
00101     if (simSpeed == 0) {
00102         return;
00103     }
00104 
00105     if (++speedCycle > 1023) {
00106         speedCycle = 0;
00107     }
00108 
00109     if (simSpeed == 1 && (speedCycle % 5) != 0) {
00110         return;
00111     }
00112 
00113     if (simSpeed == 2 && (speedCycle % 3) != 0) {
00114         return;
00115     }
00116 
00117     simulate();
00118 }
00119 
00120 
00121 /* comefrom: simFrame */
00122 void Micropolis::simulate()
00123 {
00124     static const short speedPowerScan[3] =
00125         { 2,  4,  5 };
00126     static const short SpeedPollutionTerrainLandValueScan[3] =
00127         { 2,  7, 17 };
00128     static const short speedCrimeScan[3] =
00129         { 1,  8, 18 };
00130     static const short speedPopulationDensityScan[3] = 
00131         { 1,  9, 19 };
00132     static const short speedFireAnalysis[3] =
00133         { 1, 10, 20 };
00134 
00135     short speedIndex = clamp((short)(simSpeed - 1), (short)0, (short)2);
00136 
00137     // The simulator has 16 different phases, which we cycle through
00138     // according to phaseCycle, which is incremented and wrapped at
00139     // the end of this switch.
00140 
00141     if (initSimLoad) {
00142         phaseCycle = 0;
00143     } else {
00144         phaseCycle &= 15;
00145     }
00146 
00147     switch (phaseCycle)  {
00148 
00149         case 0:
00150 
00151             if (++simCycle > 1023) {
00152                 simCycle = 0; // This is cosmic!
00153             }
00154 
00155             if (doInitialEval) {
00156                 doInitialEval = false;
00157                 cityEvaluation();
00158             }
00159 
00160             cityTime++;
00161             cityTaxAverage += cityTax;
00162 
00163             if (!(simCycle & 1)) {
00164                 setValves();
00165             }
00166 
00167             clearCensus();
00168 
00169             break;
00170 
00171         case 1:
00172         case 2:
00173         case 3:
00174         case 4:
00175         case 5:
00176         case 6:
00177         case 7:
00178         case 8:
00179 
00180             // Scan 1/8 of the map for each of the 8 phases 1..8:
00181             mapScan((phaseCycle - 1) * WORLD_W / 8, phaseCycle * WORLD_W / 8);
00182 
00183             break;
00184 
00185         case 9:
00186             if (cityTime % CENSUS_FREQUENCY_10 == 0) {
00187                 take10Census();
00188             }
00189 
00190             if (cityTime % CENSUS_FREQUENCY_120 == 0) {
00191                 take120Census();
00192             }
00193 
00194             if (cityTime % TAX_FREQUENCY == 0)  {
00195                 collectTax();
00196                 cityEvaluation();
00197             }
00198 
00199             break;
00200 
00201         case 10:
00202 
00203             if (!(simCycle % 5)) {
00204                 decRateOfGrowthMap();
00205             }
00206 
00207             decTrafficMap();
00208 
00209             newMapFlags[MAP_TYPE_TRAFFIC_DENSITY] = 1;
00210             newMapFlags[MAP_TYPE_ROAD] = 1;
00211             newMapFlags[MAP_TYPE_ALL] = 1;
00212             newMapFlags[MAP_TYPE_RES] = 1;
00213             newMapFlags[MAP_TYPE_COM] = 1;
00214             newMapFlags[MAP_TYPE_IND] = 1;
00215             newMapFlags[MAP_TYPE_DYNAMIC] = 1;
00216 
00217             sendMessages();
00218 
00219             break;
00220 
00221         case 11:
00222 
00223             if ((simCycle % speedPowerScan[speedIndex]) == 0) {
00224                 doPowerScan();
00225                 newMapFlags[MAP_TYPE_POWER] = 1;
00226                 newPower = true; /* post-release change */
00227             }
00228 
00229             break;
00230 
00231         case 12:
00232 
00233             if ((simCycle % SpeedPollutionTerrainLandValueScan[speedIndex]) == 0) {
00234                 pollutionTerrainLandValueScan();
00235             }
00236 
00237             break;
00238 
00239         case 13:
00240 
00241             if ((simCycle % speedCrimeScan[speedIndex]) == 0) {
00242                 crimeScan();
00243             }
00244 
00245             break;
00246 
00247         case 14:
00248 
00249             if ((simCycle % speedPopulationDensityScan[speedIndex]) == 0) {
00250                 populationDensityScan();
00251             }
00252 
00253             break;
00254 
00255         case 15:
00256 
00257             if ((simCycle % speedFireAnalysis[speedIndex]) == 0) {
00258                 fireAnalysis();
00259             }
00260 
00261             doDisasters();
00262 
00263             break;
00264 
00265     }
00266 
00267     // Go on the the next phase.
00268     phaseCycle = (phaseCycle + 1) & 15;
00269 }
00270 
00271 
00276 void Micropolis::doSimInit()
00277 {
00278     phaseCycle = 0;
00279     simCycle = 0;
00280 
00281     if (initSimLoad == 2) {
00282         /* if new city */
00283         initSimMemory();
00284     }
00285 
00286     if (initSimLoad == 1) {
00287         /* if city just loaded */
00288         simLoadInit();
00289     }
00290 
00291     setValves();
00292     clearCensus();
00293     mapScan(0, WORLD_W);
00294     doPowerScan();
00295     newPower = true;         /* post rel */
00296     pollutionTerrainLandValueScan();
00297     crimeScan();
00298     populationDensityScan();
00299     fireAnalysis();
00300     newMap = 1;
00301     censusChanged = true;
00302     totalPop = 1;
00303     doInitialEval = true;
00304 }
00305 
00306 
00311 void Micropolis::doNilPower()
00312 {
00313     short x, y;
00314 
00315     for (x = 0; x < WORLD_W; x++) {
00316         for (y = 0; y < WORLD_H; y++) {
00317             MapValue z = map[x][y];
00318             if (z & ZONEBIT) {
00319                 setZonePower(Position(x, y));
00320             }
00321         }
00322     }
00323 }
00324 
00325 
00327 void Micropolis::decTrafficMap()
00328 {
00329     /* tends to empty trafficDensityMap */
00330     short x, y, z;
00331 
00332     for (x = 0; x < WORLD_W; x += trafficDensityMap.MAP_BLOCKSIZE) {
00333         for (y = 0; y < WORLD_H; y += trafficDensityMap.MAP_BLOCKSIZE) {
00334             z = trafficDensityMap.worldGet(x, y);
00335             if (z == 0) {
00336                 continue;
00337             }
00338 
00339             if (z <= 24) {
00340                 trafficDensityMap.worldSet(x, y, 0);
00341                 continue;
00342             }
00343 
00344             if (z > 200) {
00345                 trafficDensityMap.worldSet(x, y, z - 34);
00346             } else {
00347                 trafficDensityMap.worldSet(x, y, z - 24);
00348             }
00349         }
00350     }
00351 }
00352 
00353 
00359 void Micropolis::decRateOfGrowthMap()
00360 {
00361     /* tends to empty rateOfGrowthMap */
00362     short x, y, z;
00363 
00364     for (x = 0; x < rateOfGrowthMap.MAP_W; x++) {
00365         for (y = 0; y < rateOfGrowthMap.MAP_H; y++) {
00366             z = rateOfGrowthMap.get(x, y);
00367             if (z == 0) {
00368                 continue;
00369             }
00370 
00371             if (z > 0) {
00372                 z--;
00373                 z = clamp(z, (short)-200, (short)200);
00374                 rateOfGrowthMap.set(x, y, z);
00375                 continue;
00376             }
00377 
00378             if (z < 0)  {
00379                 z++;
00380                 z = clamp(z, (short)-200, (short)200);
00381                 rateOfGrowthMap.set(x, y, z);
00382             }
00383         }
00384     }
00385 }

00388 /* comefrom: doSimInit */
00389 void Micropolis::initSimMemory()
00390 {
00391     setCommonInits();
00392 
00393     for (short x = 0; x < 240; x++)  {
00394         resHist[x] = 0;
00395         comHist[x] = 0;
00396         indHist[x] = 0;
00397         moneyHist[x] = 128;
00398         crimeHist[x] = 0;
00399         pollutionHist[x] = 0;
00400     }
00401 
00402     crimeRamp = 0;
00403     pollutionRamp = 0;
00404     totalPop = 0;
00405     resValve = 0;
00406     comValve = 0;
00407     indValve = 0;
00408     resCap = false; // Do not block residential growth
00409     comCap = false; // Do not block commercial growth
00410     indCap = false; // Do not block industrial growth
00411 
00412     externalMarket = 6.0;
00413     disasterEvent = SC_NONE;
00414     scoreType = SC_NONE;
00415 
00416     /* This clears powermem */
00417     powerStackPointer = 0;
00418     doPowerScan();
00419     newPower = true; /* post rel */
00420 
00421     initSimLoad = 0;
00422 }
00423 
00424 
00425 /* comefrom: doSimInit */
00426 void Micropolis::simLoadInit()
00427 {
00428     // Disaster delay table for each scenario
00429     static const short disasterWaitTable[SC_COUNT] = {
00430         0,          // No scenario (free playing)
00431         2,          // Dullsville (boredom)
00432         10,         // San francisco (earth quake)
00433         4 * 10,     // Hamburg (fire bombs)
00434         20,         // Bern (traffic)
00435         3,          // Tokyo (scary monster)
00436         5,          // Detroit (crime)
00437         5,          // Boston (nuclear meltdown)
00438         2 * 48,     // Rio (flooding)
00439     };
00440 
00441     // Time to wait before score calculation for each scenario
00442     static const short scoreWaitTable[SC_COUNT] = {
00443         0,          // No scenario (free playing)
00444         30 * 48,    // Dullsville (boredom)
00445         5 * 48,     // San francisco (earth quake)
00446         5 * 48,     // Hamburg (fire bombs)
00447         10 * 48,    // Bern (traffic)
00448         5 * 48,     // Tokyo (scary monster)
00449         10 * 48,    // Detroit (crime)
00450         5 * 48,     // Boston (nuclear meltdown)
00451         10 * 48,    // Rio (flooding)
00452     };
00453 
00454     externalMarket = (float)miscHist[1];
00455     resPop = miscHist[2];
00456     comPop = miscHist[3];
00457     indPop = miscHist[4];
00458     resValve = miscHist[5];
00459     comValve = miscHist[6];
00460     indValve = miscHist[7];
00461     crimeRamp = miscHist[10];
00462     pollutionRamp = miscHist[11];
00463     landValueAverage = miscHist[12];
00464     crimeAverage = miscHist[13];
00465     pollutionAverage = miscHist[14];
00466     gameLevel = (GameLevel)miscHist[15];
00467 
00468     if (cityTime < 0) {
00469         cityTime = 0;
00470     }
00471 
00472     if (!externalMarket) {
00473         externalMarket = 4.0;
00474     }
00475 
00476     // Set game level
00477     if (gameLevel > LEVEL_LAST || gameLevel < LEVEL_FIRST) {
00478         gameLevel = LEVEL_FIRST;
00479     }
00480     setGameLevel(gameLevel);
00481 
00482     setCommonInits();
00483 
00484     // Load cityClass
00485     cityClass = (CityClass)(miscHist[16]);
00486     if (cityClass > CC_MEGALOPOLIS || cityClass < CC_VILLAGE) {
00487         cityClass = CC_VILLAGE;
00488     }
00489 
00490     cityScore = miscHist[17];
00491     if (cityScore > 999 || cityScore < 1) {
00492         cityScore = 500;
00493     }
00494 
00495     resCap = false;
00496     comCap = false;
00497     indCap = false;
00498 
00499     cityTaxAverage = (cityTime % 48) * 7;  /* post */
00500 
00501     // Set power map.
00503     powerGridMap.fill(1);
00504 
00505     doNilPower();
00506 
00507     if (scenario >= SC_COUNT) {
00508         scenario = SC_NONE;
00509     }
00510 
00511     if (scenario != SC_NONE) {
00512         assert(LENGTH_OF(disasterWaitTable) == SC_COUNT);
00513         assert(LENGTH_OF(scoreWaitTable) == SC_COUNT);
00514 
00515         disasterEvent = scenario;
00516         disasterWait = disasterWaitTable[disasterEvent];
00517         scoreType = disasterEvent;
00518         scoreWait = scoreWaitTable[disasterEvent];
00519     } else {
00520         disasterEvent = SC_NONE;
00521         disasterWait = 0;
00522         scoreType = SC_NONE;
00523         scoreWait = 0;
00524     }
00525 
00526     roadEffect = MAX_ROAD_EFFECT;
00527     policeEffect = MAX_POLICE_STATION_EFFECT;
00528     fireEffect = MAX_FIRE_STATION_EFFECT;
00529     initSimLoad = 0;
00530 }
00531 
00532 
00533 /* comefrom: initSimMemory simLoadInit */
00534 void Micropolis::setCommonInits()
00535 {
00536     evalInit();
00537     roadEffect = MAX_ROAD_EFFECT;
00538     policeEffect = MAX_POLICE_STATION_EFFECT;
00539     fireEffect = MAX_FIRE_STATION_EFFECT;
00540     taxFlag = false;
00541     taxFund = 0;
00542 }
00543 
00544 
00545 /* comefrom: simulate doSimInit */
00546 void Micropolis::setValves()
00547 {
00549     static const short taxTable[21] = {
00550         200, 150, 120, 100, 80, 50, 30, 0, -10, -40, -100,
00551         -150, -200, -250, -300, -350, -400, -450, -500, -550, -600,
00552     };
00553     static const float extMarketParamTable[3] = {
00554         1.2f, 1.1f, 0.98f,
00555     };
00556     assert(LEVEL_COUNT == LENGTH_OF(extMarketParamTable));
00557 
00559     short resPopDenom = 8;
00560     float birthRate = 0.02;
00561     float laborBaseMax = 1.3;
00562     float internalMarketDenom = 3.7;
00563     float projectedIndPopMin = 5.0;
00564     float resRatioDefault = 1.3;
00565     float resRatioMax = 2;
00566     float comRatioMax = 2;
00567     float indRatioMax = 2;
00568     short taxMax = 20;
00569     float taxTableScale = 600;
00570 
00573     float employment, migration, births, laborBase, internalMarket;
00574     float resRatio, comRatio, indRatio;
00575     float normalizedResPop, projectedResPop, projectedComPop, projectedIndPop;
00576 
00577     miscHist[1] = (short)externalMarket;
00578     miscHist[2] = resPop;
00579     miscHist[3] = comPop;
00580     miscHist[4] = indPop;
00581     miscHist[5] = resValve;
00582     miscHist[6] = comValve;
00583     miscHist[7] = indValve;
00584     miscHist[10] = crimeRamp;
00585     miscHist[11] = pollutionRamp;
00586     miscHist[12] = landValueAverage;
00587     miscHist[13] = crimeAverage;
00588     miscHist[14] = pollutionAverage;
00589     miscHist[15] = gameLevel;
00590     miscHist[16] = (short)cityClass;
00591     miscHist[17] = cityScore;
00592 
00593     normalizedResPop = (float)resPop / (float)resPopDenom;
00594     totalPopLast = totalPop;
00595     totalPop = (short)(normalizedResPop + comPop + indPop);
00596 
00597     if (resPop > 0) {
00598         employment = (comHist[1] + indHist[1]) / normalizedResPop;
00599     } else {
00600         employment = 1;
00601     }
00602 
00603     migration = normalizedResPop * (employment - 1);
00604     births = normalizedResPop * birthRate;
00605     projectedResPop = normalizedResPop + migration + births;   // Projected res pop.
00606 
00607     // Compute laborBase
00608     float temp = comHist[1] + indHist[1];
00609     if (temp > 0.0) {
00610         laborBase = (resHist[1] / temp);
00611     } else {
00612         laborBase = 1;
00613     }
00614     laborBase = clamp(laborBase, 0.0f, laborBaseMax);
00615 
00616     internalMarket = (float)(normalizedResPop + comPop + indPop) / internalMarketDenom;
00617 
00618     projectedComPop = internalMarket * laborBase;
00619 
00620     assert(gameLevel >= LEVEL_FIRST && gameLevel <= LEVEL_LAST);
00621     projectedIndPop = indPop * laborBase * extMarketParamTable[gameLevel];
00622     projectedIndPop = max(projectedIndPop, projectedIndPopMin);
00623 
00624     if (normalizedResPop > 0) {
00625         resRatio = (float)projectedResPop / (float)normalizedResPop; // projected -vs- actual.
00626     } else {
00627         resRatio = resRatioDefault;
00628     }
00629 
00630     if (comPop > 0) {
00631         comRatio = (float)projectedComPop / (float)comPop;
00632     } else {
00633         comRatio = (float)projectedComPop;
00634     }
00635 
00636     if (indPop > 0) {
00637         indRatio = (float)projectedIndPop / (float)indPop;
00638     } else {
00639         indRatio = (float)projectedIndPop;
00640     }
00641 
00642     resRatio = min(resRatio, resRatioMax);
00643     comRatio = min(comRatio, comRatioMax);
00644     resRatio = min(indRatio, indRatioMax);
00645 
00646     // Global tax and game level effects.
00647     short z = min((short)(cityTax + gameLevel), taxMax);
00648     resRatio = (resRatio - 1) * taxTableScale + taxTable[z];
00649     comRatio = (comRatio - 1) * taxTableScale + taxTable[z];
00650     indRatio = (indRatio - 1) * taxTableScale + taxTable[z];
00651 
00652     // Ratios are velocity changes to valves.
00653     resValve = clamp(resValve + (short)resRatio, -RES_VALVE_RANGE, RES_VALVE_RANGE);
00654     comValve = clamp(comValve + (short)comRatio, -COM_VALVE_RANGE, COM_VALVE_RANGE);
00655     indValve = clamp(indValve + (short)indRatio, -IND_VALVE_RANGE, IND_VALVE_RANGE);
00656 
00657     if (resCap && resValve > 0) {
00658         resValve = 0; // Need a stadium, so cap resValve.
00659     }
00660 
00661     if (comCap && comValve > 0) {
00662         comValve = 0; // Need a airport, so cap comValve.
00663     }
00664 
00665     if (indCap && indValve > 0) {
00666         indValve = 0; // Need an seaport, so cap indValve.
00667     }
00668 
00669     valveFlag = true;
00670 }
00671

00673 /* comefrom: simulate doSimInit */
00674 void Micropolis::clearCensus()
00675 {
00676     poweredZoneCount = 0;
00677     unpoweredZoneCount = 0;
00678     firePop = 0;
00679     roadTotal = 0;
00680     railTotal = 0;
00681     resPop = 0;
00682     comPop = 0;
00683     indPop = 0;
00684     resZonePop = 0;
00685     comZonePop = 0;
00686     indZonePop = 0;
00687     hospitalPop = 0;
00688     churchPop = 0;
00689     policeStationPop = 0;
00690     fireStationPop = 0;
00691     stadiumPop = 0;
00692     coalPowerPop = 0;
00693     nuclearPowerPop = 0;
00694     seaportPop = 0;
00695     airportPop = 0;
00696     powerStackPointer = 0; /* Reset before Mapscan */
00697 
00698     fireStationMap.clear();
00699     //fireStationEffectMap.clear(); // Added in rev293
00700     policeStationMap.clear();
00701     //policeStationEffectMap.clear(); // Added in rev293
00702 
00703 }
00704 
00705 
00712 void Micropolis::take10Census()
00713 {
00714     // TODO: Make configurable parameters.
00715     int resPopDenom = 8;
00716 
00717     short x;
00718 
00719     /* put census#s in Historical Graphs and scroll data  */
00720     resHist10Max = 0;
00721     comHist10Max = 0;
00722     indHist10Max = 0;
00723 
00724     for (x = 118; x >= 0; x--)    {
00725 
00726         resHist10Max = max(resHist10Max, resHist[x]);
00727         comHist10Max = max(comHist10Max, comHist[x]);
00728         indHist10Max = max(indHist10Max, indHist[x]);
00729 
00730         resHist[x + 1] = resHist[x];
00731         comHist[x + 1] = comHist[x];
00732         indHist[x + 1] = indHist[x];
00733         crimeHist[x + 1] = crimeHist[x];
00734         pollutionHist[x + 1] = pollutionHist[x];
00735         moneyHist[x + 1] = moneyHist[x];
00736 
00737     }
00738 
00739     graph10Max = resHist10Max;
00740     graph10Max = max(graph10Max, comHist10Max);
00741     graph10Max = max(graph10Max, indHist10Max);
00742 
00743     resHist[0] = resPop / resPopDenom;
00744     comHist[0] = comPop;
00745     indHist[0] = indPop;
00746 
00747     crimeRamp += (crimeAverage - crimeRamp) / 4;
00748     crimeHist[0] = min(crimeRamp, (short)255);
00749 
00750     pollutionRamp += (pollutionAverage - pollutionRamp) / 4;
00751     pollutionHist[0] = min(pollutionRamp, (short)255);
00752 
00753     x = (cashFlow / 20) + 128;    /* scale to 0..255  */
00754     moneyHist[0] = clamp(x, (short)0, (short)255);
00755 
00756     changeCensus();
00757 
00758     short resPopScaled = resPop >> 8;
00759 
00760     if (hospitalPop < resPopScaled) {
00761         needHospital = 1;
00762     }
00763 
00764     if (hospitalPop > resPopScaled) {
00765         needHospital = -1;
00766     }
00767 
00768     if (hospitalPop == resPopScaled) {
00769         needHospital = 0;
00770     }
00771 
00772     int faithfulPop = resPopScaled + faith;
00773 
00774     if (churchPop < faithfulPop) {
00775         needChurch = 1;
00776     }
00777 
00778     if (churchPop > faithfulPop) {
00779         needChurch = -1;
00780     }
00781 
00782     if (churchPop == faithfulPop) {
00783         needChurch = 0;
00784     }
00785 }
00786 
00787 
00788 /* comefrom: simulate */
00789 void Micropolis::take120Census()
00790 {
00791     // TODO: Make configurable parameters.
00792     int resPopDenom = 8;
00793 
00794     /* Long Term Graphs */
00795     short x;
00796 
00797     resHist120Max = 0;
00798     comHist120Max = 0;
00799     indHist120Max = 0;
00800 
00801     for (x = 238; x >= 120; x--)  {
00802 
00803         resHist120Max = max(resHist120Max, resHist[x]);
00804         comHist120Max = max(comHist120Max, comHist[x]);
00805         indHist120Max = max(indHist120Max, indHist[x]);
00806 
00807         resHist[x + 1] = resHist[x];
00808         comHist[x + 1] = comHist[x];
00809         indHist[x + 1] = indHist[x];
00810         crimeHist[x + 1] = crimeHist[x];
00811         pollutionHist[x + 1] = pollutionHist[x];
00812         moneyHist[x + 1] = moneyHist[x];
00813 
00814     }
00815 
00816     graph120Max = resHist120Max;
00817     graph120Max = max(graph120Max, comHist120Max);
00818     graph120Max = max(graph120Max, indHist120Max);
00819 
00820     resHist[120] = resPop / resPopDenom;
00821     comHist[120] = comPop;
00822     indHist[120] = indPop;
00823     crimeHist[120] = crimeHist[0] ;
00824     pollutionHist[120] = pollutionHist[0];
00825     moneyHist[120] = moneyHist[0];
00826     changeCensus();
00827 }
00828 
00829 
00838 void Micropolis::collectTax()
00839 {
00840     short z;
00841 
00845     static const float RLevels[3] = { 0.7, 0.9, 1.2 };
00846     static const float FLevels[3] = { 1.4, 1.2, 0.8 };
00847 
00848     assert(LEVEL_COUNT == LENGTH_OF(RLevels));
00849     assert(LEVEL_COUNT == LENGTH_OF(FLevels));
00850 
00851     cashFlow = 0;
00852 
00859     if (!taxFlag) { // If the Tax Port is clear
00860 
00862         z = cityTaxAverage / 48;  // post release
00863 
00864         cityTaxAverage = 0;
00865 
00866         policeFund = (long)policeStationPop * 100;
00867         fireFund = (long)fireStationPop * 100;
00868         roadFund = (long)((roadTotal + (railTotal * 2)) * RLevels[gameLevel]);
00869         taxFund = (long)((((Quad)totalPop * landValueAverage) / 120) * cityTax * FLevels[gameLevel]);
00870 
00871         if (totalPop > 0) {
00872             /* There are people to tax. */
00873             cashFlow = (short)(taxFund - (policeFund + fireFund + roadFund));
00874             doBudget();
00875         } else {
00876             /* Nobody lives here. */
00877             roadEffect   = MAX_ROAD_EFFECT;
00878             policeEffect = MAX_POLICE_STATION_EFFECT;
00879             fireEffect   = MAX_FIRE_STATION_EFFECT;
00880         }
00881     }
00882 }
00883 
00884 
00894 void Micropolis::updateFundEffects()
00895 {
00896     // Compute road effects of funding
00897     roadEffect = MAX_ROAD_EFFECT;
00898     if (roadFund > 0) {
00899         // Multiply with funding fraction
00900         roadEffect = (short)((float)roadEffect * (float)roadSpend / (float)roadFund);
00901     }
00902 
00903     // Compute police station effects of funding
00904     policeEffect = MAX_POLICE_STATION_EFFECT;
00905     if (policeFund > 0) {
00906         // Multiply with funding fraction
00907         policeEffect = (short)((float)policeEffect * (float)policeSpend / (float)policeFund);
00908     }
00909 
00910     // Compute fire station effects of funding
00911     fireEffect = MAX_FIRE_STATION_EFFECT;
00912     if (fireFund > 0) {
00913         // Multiply with funding fraction
00914         fireEffect = (short)((float)fireEffect * (float)fireSpend / (float)fireFund);
00915     }
00916 
00917 #if 0
00918     printf("========== updateFundEffects road %d %d %d fire %d %d %d police %d %d %d\n",
00919         (int)roadEffect, (int)roadSpend, (int)roadFund,
00920         (int)fireEffect, (int)fireSpend, (int)fireFund,
00921         (int)policeEffect, (int)policeSpend, (int)policeFund);
00922 #endif
00923 
00924     mustDrawBudget = 1;
00925 }
00926 
00927 
00928 /* comefrom: simulate doSimInit */
00929 void Micropolis::mapScan(int x1, int x2)
00930 {
00931     short x, y;
00932 
00933     for (x = x1; x < x2; x++) {
00934         for (y = 0; y < WORLD_H; y++) {
00935 
00936             MapValue mapVal = map[x][y];
00937             if (mapVal == DIRT) {
00938                 continue;
00939             }
00940 
00941             MapTile tile = mapVal & LOMASK;  /* Mask off status bits  */
00942 
00943             if (tile < FLOOD) {
00944                 continue;
00945             }
00946 
00947             // tile >= FLOOD
00948 
00949             Position pos(x, y);
00950 
00951 
00952             if (tile < ROADBASE) {
00953 
00954                 if (tile >= FIREBASE) {
00955                     firePop++;
00956                     if (!(getRandom16() & 3)) {
00957                         doFire(pos);    /* 1 in 4 times */
00958                     }
00959                     continue;
00960                 }
00961 
00962                 if (tile < RADTILE) {
00963                     doFlood(pos);
00964                 } else {
00965                     doRadTile(pos);
00966                 }
00967 
00968                 continue;
00969             }
00970 
00971             if (newPower && (mapVal & CONDBIT)) {
00972                 // Copy PWRBIT from powerGridMap
00973                 setZonePower(pos);
00974             }
00975 
00976             if (tile >= ROADBASE && tile < POWERBASE) {
00977                 doRoad(pos);
00978                 continue;
00979             }
00980 
00981             if (mapVal & ZONEBIT) { /* process Zones */
00982                 doZone(pos);
00983                 continue;
00984             }
00985 
00986             if (tile >= RAILBASE && tile < RESBASE) {
00987                 doRail(pos);
00988                 continue;
00989             }
00990 
00991             if (tile >= SOMETINYEXP && tile <= LASTTINYEXP) {
00992                 /* clear AniRubble */
00993                 map[x][y] = randomRubble();
00994             }
00995         }
00996     }
00997 }
00998 
00999 
01005 void Micropolis::doRail(const Position &pos)
01006 {
01007     railTotal++;
01008 
01009     generateTrain(pos.posX, pos.posY);
01010 
01011     if (roadEffect < (15 * MAX_ROAD_EFFECT / 16)) {
01012 
01013         // roadEffect < 15/16 of max road, enable deteriorating rail
01014         if (!(getRandom16() & 511)) {
01015 
01016             MapValue curValue = map[pos.posX][pos.posY];
01017             if (!(curValue & CONDBIT)) {
01018 
01019                 // Otherwise the '(getRandom16() & 31)' makes no sense
01020                 assert(MAX_ROAD_EFFECT == 32);
01021                 if (roadEffect < (getRandom16() & 31)) {
01022                     MapTile tile = curValue & LOMASK;
01023                     if (tile < RAILBASE + 2) {
01024                         map[pos.posX][pos.posY] = RIVER;
01025                     } else {
01026                         map[pos.posX][pos.posY] = randomRubble();
01027                     }
01028                     return;
01029                 }
01030             }
01031         }
01032     }
01033 }
01034 
01035 
01040 void Micropolis::doRadTile(const Position &pos)
01041 {
01042     if ((getRandom16() & 4095) == 0) {
01043         map[pos.posX][pos.posY] = DIRT; /* Radioactive decay */
01044     }
01045 }
01046 
01047 
01052 void Micropolis::doRoad(const Position &pos)
01053 {
01054     short tden, z;
01055     static const short densityTable[3] = { ROADBASE, LTRFBASE, HTRFBASE };
01056 
01057     roadTotal++;
01058 
01059     MapValue mapValue = map[pos.posX][pos.posY];
01060     MapTile tile = mapValue & LOMASK;
01061 
01062     /* generateBus(pos.posX, pos.posY); */
01063 
01064     if (roadEffect < (15 * MAX_ROAD_EFFECT / 16)) {
01065         // roadEffect < 15/16 of max road, enable deteriorating road
01066         if ((getRandom16() & 511) == 0) {
01067             if (!(mapValue & CONDBIT)) {
01068                 assert(MAX_ROAD_EFFECT == 32); // Otherwise the '(getRandom16() & 31)' makes no sense
01069                 if (roadEffect < (getRandom16() & 31)) {
01070                     if ((tile & 15) < 2 || (tile & 15) == 15) {
01071                         map[pos.posX][pos.posY] = RIVER;
01072                     } else {
01073                         map[pos.posX][pos.posY] = randomRubble();
01074                     }
01075                     return;
01076                 }
01077             }
01078         }
01079     }
01080 
01081     if ((mapValue & BURNBIT) == 0) { /* If Bridge */
01082         roadTotal += 4; // Bridge counts as 4 road tiles
01083         if (doBridge(Position(pos.posX, pos.posY), tile)) {
01084             return;
01085         }
01086     }
01087 
01088     if (tile < LTRFBASE) {
01089         tden = 0;
01090     } else if (tile < HTRFBASE) {
01091         tden = 1;
01092     } else {
01093         roadTotal++; // Heavy traffic counts as 2 roads.
01094         tden = 2;
01095     }
01096 
01097     short trafficDensity = trafficDensityMap.worldGet(pos.posX, pos.posY) >>6;
01098 
01099     if (trafficDensity > 1) {
01100         trafficDensity--;
01101     }
01102 
01103     if (tden != trafficDensity) { /* tden 0..2   */
01104         z = ((tile - ROADBASE) & 15) + densityTable[trafficDensity];
01105         z |= mapValue & (ALLBITS - ANIMBIT);
01106 
01107         if (trafficDensity > 0) {
01108             z |= ANIMBIT;
01109         }
01110 
01111         map[pos.posX][pos.posY] = z;
01112     }
01113 }
01114 
01115 
01125 bool Micropolis::doBridge(const Position &pos, MapTile tile)
01126 {
01127     static short HDx[7] = { -2,  2, -2, -1,  0,  1,  2 };
01128     static short HDy[7] = { -1, -1,  0,  0,  0,  0,  0 };
01129     static short HBRTAB[7] = {
01130         HBRDG1 | BULLBIT, HBRDG3 | BULLBIT, HBRDG0 | BULLBIT,
01131         RIVER, BRWH | BULLBIT, RIVER, HBRDG2 | BULLBIT,
01132     };
01133     static short HBRTAB2[7] = {
01134         RIVER, RIVER, HBRIDGE | BULLBIT, HBRIDGE | BULLBIT, HBRIDGE | BULLBIT,
01135         HBRIDGE | BULLBIT, HBRIDGE | BULLBIT,
01136     };
01137     static short VDx[7] = {  0,  1,  0,  0,  0,  0,  1 };
01138     static short VDy[7] = { -2, -2, -1,  0,  1,  2,  2 };
01139     static short VBRTAB[7] = {
01140         VBRDG0 | BULLBIT, VBRDG1 | BULLBIT, RIVER, BRWV | BULLBIT,
01141         RIVER, VBRDG2 | BULLBIT, VBRDG3 | BULLBIT,
01142     };
01143     static short VBRTAB2[7] = {
01144         VBRIDGE | BULLBIT, RIVER, VBRIDGE | BULLBIT, VBRIDGE | BULLBIT,
01145         VBRIDGE | BULLBIT, VBRIDGE | BULLBIT, RIVER,
01146     };
01147     int z, x, y, MPtem;
01148 
01149     if (tile == BRWV) { /*  Vertical bridge close */
01150 
01151         if ((!(getRandom16() & 3)) && getBoatDistance(pos) > 340) {
01152 
01153             for (z = 0; z < 7; z++) { /* Close */
01154 
01155                 x = pos.posX + VDx[z];
01156                 y = pos.posY + VDy[z];
01157 
01158                 if (testBounds(x, y)) {
01159 
01160                     if ((map[x][y] & LOMASK) == (VBRTAB[z] & LOMASK)) {
01161                         map[x][y] = VBRTAB2[z];
01162                     }
01163 
01164                 }
01165             }
01166         }
01167         return true;
01168     }
01169 
01170     if (tile == BRWH) { /*  Horizontal bridge close  */
01171 
01172         if ((!(getRandom16() & 3)) && getBoatDistance(pos) > 340) {
01173 
01174             for (z = 0; z < 7; z++) { /* Close */
01175 
01176                 x = pos.posX + HDx[z];
01177                 y = pos.posY + HDy[z];
01178 
01179                 if (testBounds(x, y)) {
01180 
01181                     if ((map[x][y] & LOMASK) == (HBRTAB[z] & LOMASK)) {
01182 
01183                         map[x][y] = HBRTAB2[z];
01184 
01185                     }
01186                 }
01187             }
01188         }
01189         return true;
01190     }
01191 
01192     if (getBoatDistance(pos) < 300 || (!(getRandom16() & 7))) {
01193         if (tile & 1) {
01194             if (pos.posX < WORLD_W - 1) {
01195                 if (map[pos.posX + 1][pos.posY] == CHANNEL) { /* Vertical open */
01196 
01197                     for (z = 0; z < 7; z++) {
01198 
01199                         x = pos.posX + VDx[z];
01200                         y = pos.posY + VDy[z];
01201 
01202                         if (testBounds(x, y)) {
01203 
01204                             MPtem = map[x][y];
01205                             if (MPtem == CHANNEL || ((MPtem & 15) == (VBRTAB2[z] & 15))) {
01206                                 map[x][y] = VBRTAB[z];
01207                             }
01208                         }
01209                     }
01210                     return true;
01211                 }
01212             }
01213             return false;
01214 
01215         } else {
01216 
01217             if (pos.posY > 0) {
01218                 if (map[pos.posX][pos.posY - 1] == CHANNEL) {
01219 
01220                     /* Horizontal open  */
01221                     for (z = 0; z < 7; z++) {
01222 
01223                         x = pos.posX + HDx[z];
01224                         y = pos.posY + HDy[z];
01225 
01226                         if (testBounds(x, y)) {
01227 
01228                             MPtem = map[x][y];
01229                             if (((MPtem & 15) == (HBRTAB2[z] & 15)) || MPtem == CHANNEL) {
01230                                 map[x][y] = HBRTAB[z];
01231                             }
01232                         }
01233                     }
01234                     return true;
01235                 }
01236             }
01237             return false;
01238         }
01239 
01240     }
01241     return false;
01242 }
01243 
01244 
01250 int Micropolis::getBoatDistance(const Position &pos)
01251 {
01252     int sprDist;
01253     SimSprite *sprite;
01254 
01255     int dist = 99999;
01256     int mx = pos.posX * 16 + 8;
01257     int my = pos.posY * 16 + 8;
01258 
01259     for (sprite = spriteList; sprite != NULL; sprite = sprite->next) {
01260         if (sprite->type == SPRITE_SHIP && sprite->frame != 0) {
01261 
01262             sprDist = absoluteValue(sprite->x + sprite->xHot - mx)
01263                     + absoluteValue(sprite->y + sprite->yHot - my);
01264 
01265             dist = min(dist, sprDist);
01266         }
01267     }
01268     return dist;
01269 }
01270 
01271 
01280 void Micropolis::doFire(const Position &pos)
01281 {
01282     static const short DX[4] = { -1,  0,  1,  0 };
01283     static const short DY[4] = {  0, -1,  0,  1 };
01284 
01285     // Try to set neighbouring tiles on fire as well
01286     for (short z = 0; z < 4; z++) {
01287 
01288         if ((getRandom16() & 7) == 0) {
01289 
01290             short xTem = pos.posX + DX[z];
01291             short yTem = pos.posY + DY[z];
01292 
01293             if (testBounds(xTem, yTem)) {
01294 
01295                 MapValue c = map[xTem][yTem];
01296                 if (!(c & BURNBIT)) {
01297                     continue;
01298                 }
01299 
01300                 if (c & ZONEBIT) {
01301                     // Neighbour is a zone and burnable
01302                     fireZone(Position(xTem, yTem), c);
01303 
01304                     if ((c & LOMASK) > IZB) { /* Explode */
01305                           makeExplosionAt(xTem *16 + 8, yTem * 16 + 8);
01306                     }
01307                 }
01308 
01309                 map[xTem][yTem] = randomFire();
01310             }
01311         }
01312     }
01313 
01314     // Compute likelyhood of fire running out of fuel
01315     short rate = 10; // Likelyhood of extinguishing (bigger means less chance)
01316     short z = fireStationEffectMap.worldGet(pos.posX, pos.posY);
01317 
01318     if (z > 0) {
01319         rate = 3;
01320         if (z > 20) {
01321             rate = 2;
01322         }
01323         if (z > 100) {
01324             rate = 1;
01325         }
01326     }
01327 
01328     // Decide whether to put out the fire.
01329     if (getRandom(rate) == 0) {
01330         map[pos.posX][pos.posY] = randomRubble();
01331     }
01332 }
01333 
01334 
01343 void Micropolis::fireZone(const Position &pos, MapValue ch)
01344 {
01345     short XYmax;
01346 
01347     int value = rateOfGrowthMap.worldGet(pos.posX, pos.posY);
01348     value = clamp(value - 20, -200, 200);
01349     rateOfGrowthMap.worldSet(pos.posX, pos.posY, value);
01350 
01351     ch = ch & LOMASK;
01352 
01353     if (ch < PORTBASE) {
01354         XYmax = 2;
01355     } else {
01356         if (ch == AIRPORT) {
01357             XYmax = 5;
01358         } else {
01359             XYmax = 4;
01360         }
01361     }
01362 
01363     // Make remaining tiles of the zone bulldozable
01364     for (short x = -1; x < XYmax; x++) {
01365         for (short y = -1; y < XYmax; y++) {
01366 
01367             short xTem = pos.posX + x;
01368             short yTem = pos.posY + y;
01369 
01370             if (!testBounds(xTem, yTem)) {
01371                 continue;
01372             }
01373 
01374             if ((MapTile)(map[xTem][yTem] & LOMASK) >= ROADBASE) {
01375                 /* post release */
01376                 map[xTem][yTem] |= BULLBIT;
01377             }
01378 
01379         }
01380     }
01381 }
01382 
01383 
01390 void Micropolis::repairZone(const Position &pos, MapTile zCent, short zSize)
01391 {
01392     MapTile tile = zCent - 2 - zSize;
01393 
01394     // y and x loops one position shifted to compensate for the center-tile position.
01395     for (short y = -1; y < zSize - 1; y++) {
01396         for (short x = -1; x < zSize - 1; x++) {
01397 
01398             int xx = pos.posX + x;
01399             int yy = pos.posY + y;
01400 
01401             tile++;
01402 
01403             if (testBounds(xx, yy)) {
01404 
01405                 MapValue mapValue = map[xx][yy];
01406 
01407                 if (mapValue & ZONEBIT) {
01408                     continue;
01409                 }
01410 
01411                 if (mapValue & ANIMBIT) {
01412                     continue;
01413                 }
01414 
01415                 MapTile mapTile = mapValue & LOMASK;
01416 
01417                 if (mapTile < RUBBLE || mapTile >= ROADBASE) {
01418                     map[xx][yy] = tile | CONDBIT | BURNBIT;
01419                 }
01420             }
01421         }
01422     }
01423 }
01424 
01425 
01431 void Micropolis::doSpecialZone(const Position &pos, bool powerOn)
01432 {
01433     // Bigger numbers reduce chance of nuclear melt down
01434     static const short meltdownTable[3] = { 30000, 20000, 10000 };
01435 
01436     MapTile tile = map[pos.posX][pos.posY] & LOMASK;
01437 
01438     switch (tile) {
01439 
01440         case POWERPLANT:
01441 
01442             coalPowerPop++;
01443 
01444             if ((cityTime & 7) == 0) {
01445                 repairZone(pos, POWERPLANT, 4); /* post */
01446             }
01447 
01448             pushPowerStack(pos);
01449             coalSmoke(pos);
01450 
01451             return;
01452 
01453         case NUCLEAR:
01454 
01455             assert(LEVEL_COUNT == LENGTH_OF(meltdownTable));
01456 
01457             if (enableDisasters && !getRandom(meltdownTable[gameLevel])) {
01458                 doMeltdown(pos);
01459                 return;
01460             }
01461 
01462             nuclearPowerPop++;
01463 
01464             if ((cityTime & 7) == 0) {
01465                 repairZone(pos, NUCLEAR, 4); /* post */
01466             }
01467 
01468             pushPowerStack(pos);
01469 
01470             return;
01471 
01472         case FIRESTATION: {
01473 
01474             int z;
01475 
01476             fireStationPop++;
01477 
01478             if (!(cityTime & 7)) {
01479                 repairZone(pos, FIRESTATION, 3); /* post */
01480             }
01481 
01482             if (powerOn) {
01483                 z = fireEffect;                   /* if powered get effect  */
01484             } else {
01485                 z = fireEffect / 2;               /* from the funding ratio  */
01486             }
01487 
01488             Position pos2(pos);
01489             bool foundRoad = findPerimeterRoad(&pos2);
01490 
01491             if (!foundRoad) {
01492                 z = z / 2;                        /* post FD's need roads  */
01493             }
01494 
01495             int value = fireStationMap.worldGet(pos2.posX, pos2.posY);
01496             value += z;
01497             fireStationMap.worldSet(pos2.posX, pos2.posY, value);
01498 
01499             return;
01500         }
01501 
01502         case POLICESTATION: {
01503 
01504             int z;
01505 
01506             policeStationPop++;
01507 
01508             if (!(cityTime & 7)) {
01509                 repairZone(pos, POLICESTATION, 3); /* post */
01510             }
01511 
01512             if (powerOn) {
01513                 z = policeEffect;
01514             } else {
01515                 z = policeEffect / 2;
01516             }
01517 
01518             Position pos2(pos);
01519             bool foundRoad = findPerimeterRoad(&pos2);
01520 
01521             if (!foundRoad) {
01522                 z = z / 2; /* post PD's need roads */
01523             }
01524 
01525             int value = policeStationMap.worldGet(pos2.posX, pos2.posY);
01526             value += z;
01527             policeStationMap.worldSet(pos2.posX, pos2.posY, value);
01528 
01529             return;
01530         }
01531 
01532         case STADIUM:  // Empty stadium
01533 
01534             stadiumPop++;
01535 
01536             if (!(cityTime & 15)) {
01537                 repairZone(pos, STADIUM, 4);
01538             }
01539 
01540             if (powerOn) {
01541                 // Every now and then, display a match
01542                 if (((cityTime + pos.posX + pos.posY) & 31) == 0) {
01543                     drawStadium(pos, FULLSTADIUM);
01544                     map[pos.posX + 1][pos.posY] = FOOTBALLGAME1 + ANIMBIT;
01545                     map[pos.posX + 1][pos.posY + 1] = FOOTBALLGAME2 + ANIMBIT;
01546                 }
01547             }
01548 
01549             return;
01550 
01551        case FULLSTADIUM:  // Full stadium
01552 
01553             stadiumPop++;
01554 
01555             if (((cityTime + pos.posX + pos.posY) & 7) == 0) {
01556                 // Stop the match
01557                 drawStadium(pos, STADIUM);
01558             }
01559 
01560             return;
01561 
01562        case AIRPORT:
01563 
01564             airportPop++;
01565 
01566             if ((cityTime & 7) == 0) {
01567                 repairZone(pos, AIRPORT, 6);
01568             }
01569 
01570             // If powered, display a rotating radar
01571             if (powerOn) {
01572                 if ((map[pos.posX + 1][pos.posY - 1] & LOMASK) == RADAR) {
01573                     map[pos.posX + 1][pos.posY - 1] = RADAR0 + ANIMBIT + CONDBIT + BURNBIT;
01574                 }
01575             } else {
01576                 map[pos.posX + 1][pos.posY - 1] = RADAR + CONDBIT + BURNBIT;
01577             }
01578 
01579             if (powerOn) { // Handle the airport only if there is power
01580                 doAirport(pos);
01581             }
01582 
01583             return;
01584 
01585        case PORT:
01586 
01587             seaportPop++;
01588 
01589             if ((cityTime & 15) == 0) {
01590                 repairZone(pos, PORT, 4);
01591             }
01592 
01593             // If port has power and there is no ship, generate one
01594             if (powerOn && getSprite(SPRITE_SHIP) == NULL) {
01595                 generateShip();
01596             }
01597 
01598             return;
01599     }
01600 }
01601 
01602 
01610 void Micropolis::drawStadium(const Position &center, MapTile z)
01611 {
01612     int x, y;
01613 
01614     z = z - 5;
01615 
01616     for (y = center.posY - 1; y < center.posY + 3; y++) {
01617         for (x = center.posX - 1; x < center.posX + 3; x++) {
01618             map[x][y] = z | BNCNBIT;
01619             z++;
01620         }
01621     }
01622 
01623     map[center.posX][center.posY] |= ZONEBIT | PWRBIT;
01624 }
01625 
01626 
01631 void Micropolis::doAirport(const Position &pos)
01632 {
01633     if (getRandom(5) == 0) {
01634         generatePlane(pos);
01635         return;
01636     }
01637 
01638     if (getRandom(12) == 0) {
01639         generateCopter(pos);
01640     }
01641 }
01642 
01643 
01648 void Micropolis::coalSmoke(const Position &pos)
01649 {
01650     static const short SmTb[4] = {
01651         COALSMOKE1, COALSMOKE2,
01652         COALSMOKE3, COALSMOKE4,
01653     };
01654     static const short dx[4] = {  1,  2,  1,  2 };
01655     static const short dy[4] = { -1, -1,  0,  0 };
01656 
01657     for (short x = 0; x < 4; x++) {
01658         map[pos.posX + dx[x]][pos.posY + dy[x]] =
01659             SmTb[x] | ANIMBIT | CONDBIT | PWRBIT | BURNBIT;
01660     }
01661 }
01662 
01663 
01668 void Micropolis::doMeltdown(const Position &pos)
01669 {
01670     makeExplosion(pos.posX - 1, pos.posY - 1);
01671     makeExplosion(pos.posX - 1, pos.posY + 2);
01672     makeExplosion(pos.posX + 2, pos.posY - 1);
01673     makeExplosion(pos.posX + 2, pos.posY + 2);
01674 
01675     // Whole power plant is at fire
01676     for (int x = pos.posX - 1; x < pos.posX + 3; x++) {
01677         for (int y = pos.posY - 1; y < pos.posY + 3; y++) {
01678             map[x][y] = randomFire();
01679         }
01680     }
01681 
01682     // Add lots of radiation tiles around the plant
01683     for (int z = 0; z < 200; z++)  {
01684 
01685         int x = pos.posX - 20 + getRandom(40);
01686         int y = pos.posY - 15 + getRandom(30);
01687 
01688         if (!testBounds(x, y)) { // Ignore off-map positions
01689             continue;
01690         }
01691 
01692         MapValue t = map[x][y];
01693 
01694         if (t & ZONEBIT) {
01695             continue; // Ignore zones
01696         }
01697 
01698         if ((t & BURNBIT) || t == DIRT) {
01699             map[x][y] = RADTILE; // Make tile radio-active
01700         }
01701 
01702     }
01703 
01704     // Report disaster to the user
01705     sendMessage(MESSAGE_NUCLEAR_MELTDOWN, pos.posX, pos.posY, true, true);
01706 }
